title: Welcome to Doral
abstract: Doral is a dynamic city in Miami-Dade County, known for its vibrant cultural influences and thriving business environment. Home to a diverse population, it combines a strong Latin American heritage with modern amenities, making it a hub for international commerce and family-friendly living. The city boasts an array of parks, world-class golf courses, and a growing dining scene, offering residents and visitors plenty of recreational activities. Its strategic location near Miami International Airport and major highways also makes Doral a prime destination for business travelers and tourists alike

packages.title: Doral Park Day
packages.description: Spend a relaxing day at Doral Central Park, enjoying greenery, jogging trails, and family-friendly activities.

packages.title: Doral Golf Experience
packages.description: Enjoy a luxurious golf day at the world-renowned National Doral Golf Club.

packages.title: Ventanita Tour
packages.description: Tour Doral's famous 'ventanitas' where you can enjoy the best Cuban coffee and snacks like croquetas.

packages.title: Doralzuela Tour
packages.description: Experience the rich Venezuelan culture in Doral, with delicious arepas and tequeños on this cultural food tour.

packages.title: Doral Shopping Extravaganza
packages.description: Shop 'til you drop at Doral’s best retail destinations, including CityPlace Doral.

packages.title: Doral Food Truck Fest
packages.description: Taste the best of Doral at the Food Truck Fest, featuring a variety of gourmet options from local food trucks.
